===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=つうぎょう}} compound {{m|zh|通曉|tr=thuwng xew<sup>X</sup>|lit=through, thorough + understand}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} {{zh-l|通曉|tr=tung<sup>1</sup> hiu<sup>2</sup>|to thoroughly understand}}.

{{ja-pron|yomi=kanyo|つうぎょう|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

{{ja-noun|つうぎょう|kyu=通曉|hhira=つうげう}}

# [[thorough]] [[knowledge]] of something

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|trans=intrans|つうぎょう|kyu=通曉|hhira=つうげう}}

# to be [[well]] [[versed]] in something, to be [[thoroughly]] [[acquainted]] with something
#: {{ja-usex|教授は日本の文化に'''通暁'''している。|^きょうじゅ は にほん の ぶんか に '''つうぎょう''' して いる。|The professor is '''well versed''' in Japanese culture.}}
